transcript: when you have enough reach you can manufacture money at the drop of a hat Elon Musk released musk by Elon which was a cologne and he sold 50 000 units in like an hour this was like 50 or 100 bucks a pop and so 50 000 units times a hundred dollars is five million dollars and he did it in an hour and it wasn't even a good product the product smelled like burning hair but to show you how loyal an audience is and when you have that level of reach if you show one advertisement to every single human on the planet you will sell a lot of units of it even if it's terrible
